description:
This particular course has been designed of people who want to learn the software by starting from the very basic functions and move to Intermediate in less time.

Excel is one of the most popular Spreadsheet programs available in the market used for complex calculations, financial statements, and tables. However using this software can be tricky if you are unaware of the basics of Excel.

The topics cover the fundamentals of opening, saving and making an excel file to advance level topics of Conditional formatting, Freezing Pans, Protecting and Hiding, Sorting, and Find Replace, and Basic Formulas. The course has been made keeping in mind different learning requirements of students.

The topics are covered with screen shots in PDFs followed by video tutorials of the functions. The course has been divided in 5 sections with every section having its own test.

You can learn the software in your own time and at your own pace with your choice of learning material.
title: Fast Paced 2 Days Excel 2016 Crash Course
